description: The Mutti and Monini families have been in business for decades and pride themselves on producing exceptional quality products. Transform your meals with the superior flavours of Mutti Cherry Tomatoes and Monini Classico Extra Virgin Olive Oil.
keywords: Minestrone,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Minestrone Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Monini Classico Extra Virgin Olive Oil
100g green beans, trimmed, cut into 2cm pieces
0.5 bunch silverbeet, stems removed, leaves shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan or stockpot over medium heat. Add onion, carrot and celery, then cook for 5 minutes or until softened. Stir in garlic and potato, then cook for 1 minute. Add tomatoes, passata and stock, season and simmer for 5 minutes.

Add beans, pasta and oregano, increase heat to medium-high and bring to the boil. Cook for 5 minutes. Add green beans, zucchini and silverbeet. Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 10 minutes or until vegetables and pasta are tender. Serve topped with parmesan.
